DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the Venner videolaryngoscope (A.P. Advance™) is beneficial for intubation of pediatric manikins while performing CPR. In the current study, we compared effectiveness of the Venner videolaryngoscope (A.P. Advance™) and MIL laryngoscopes in child resuscitation with and without CC.
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in nursing Not meet the above criteria Wrist or Low back diseases
